Description: Blue glazed composition(now green) shabti of Padipep with relief detail: a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and parallel hands holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the back-pillar is inscribed with two columns of Hieroglyphs; plinth beneath the foot.
Curator's comments: The collection contains two other shabtis of the same man (EA 37570 and 53895).
